quote: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum... but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
A dropout will beat the genius through hard work. And I will prove it!
Knowing what it feels to be in pain is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
When people get hurt, they learn to hate... When people hurt others, they become hated and racked with guilt.
The hole in one's heart gets filled by others... My friends made me realize that.
Those who cannot acknowledge themselves will eventually fail.
A shinobi's life is not measured by how they live but by what they accomplish before their death.
True power doesn't come when you're fighting for yourself. It comes when you're fighting to protect someone.
The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.
If you want to kill me, curse me! Hate me! And live a long, unsightly life!
A true teacher doesn't teach nature transformation; they teach you how to live your life.
The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
Sympathy? That's the emotion I hate the most. It changes nothing.
People cannot win against their loneliness.
The longer you live, the more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering, and emptiness.
When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.
If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them.
Love is not necessary; power is the only true necessity!
The world is not as simple as I thought it was... so I stopped thinking.
A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
I don't care if I die. I don't have to win... I just need to stand my ground and not run.
When you give up, your dreams and everything else, they're gone.
Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!
The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives but how he dies.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.
The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It's one of the never-ending cycles in life.
No matter how much you hate it, this is who you are. Trying to run from that is no different than running from yourself.
A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.
A ninja is one who endures no matter what gets thrown at him.
The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.
You should give up trying to make me give up!
When you protect someone you love, courage wells up from within.
The world is full of hatred and pain. But I still believe it's possible to achieve peace.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed!
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.

A genius, huh? What does that mean? 'Genius'? So I was not born with a whole lot of natural talent, not gifted like Neji... but I work hard and I never give up! That is my gift... that is my ninja way!
If you don't like your path, start paving another one!
I will love you always, until the day I die and beyond. Even then, I will love you throughout all time.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain.
The fire of youth burns eternal!
I won't let my comrades die. I'll protect you with my life!
If you want to kill me, hate me, detest me, and survive in an unsightly way.
The moment when people understand each other... that's when true peace begins.
I exist not to be defeated.
The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.
I finally understand now... I'm needed by someone. I'm needed right here!
People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true... that's how they define reality.
A ninja must see underneath the underneath.
I'm not perfect, but I am always me.

Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this accursed world. The longer you live, the more you realize that the only things that truly exist in this reality are merely pain, suffering and futility.
When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
The true power of the Sharingan... isn't just copying jutsu. It's seeing through all lies and understanding the truth of this world.
I will never stop believing in my own ninja way!
In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers.
Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
The Uchiha is a clan destined for revenge. Even if that revenge... is against their own blood.
The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning in this world.
True loneliness is being in a room full of people and still feeling alone.
The difference between a novice and a master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
This cursed world... the cycle of hatred... I will break it!
The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate. And hate is what creates sacrifice.
I never go back on my word! That's my nindo, my ninja way!
There is no such thing as hope in battle. There is only absolute despair born from the collective consciousness of humanity.
The Infinite Tsukuyomi will finally bring peace to this world. An end to the cursed cycle of hatred.
A ninja's life is not measured by how they lived but rather what they accomplished before their death.
The secret technique of every shinobi... is to never give up!
If you want to change, start by changing yourself first.
Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.
I will never allow comrades to kill each other on my watch!
Art is a blast! It is fleeting beauty!
The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
When you have something important to protect, that's when you can become truly strong.
The darkness in people's hearts... that's what true ugliness is.
In this world, there is no such thing as a painless lesson.
A heart filled with revenge has no room for love.
True strength isn't about winning battles. It's about protecting what matters most.
The will of fire will never be extinguished!
There's no advantage in hurrying through life.
A shinobi's weapon is their heart!
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Have the courage to change it!
To become Hokage is my dream!
The strongest poison is hatred.
In society, those who don't have many abilities, often complain more.
The eyes that see darkness and the hands that feel pain will someday create light.
A life without purpose is no life at all.
We fight not to kill, but to protect the precious lives around us.
The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
True change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination.
The moment people come to understand each other, the world will finally know peace.
A life without sacrifice is one without meaning.
In the end, power is the only real virtue... and weakness, the only vice.
The path to peace is paved with sacrifices.
Even if I die, I will always be Hokage!
Believe it!
The longer the shadow is cast, the brighter the light must be.
A true master is an eternal student.
Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
The power of one person isn't enough to change anything. That's why we need to accept help from others.
A wound that's never healed... that's what hatred is.
When you protect someone precious to you, you gain true strength.
My pain is far greater than yours!
The true battle begins only after you've been pushed to your limits.
A dream isn't something you see when you're asleep. It's something that won't let you sleep.
The world is full of hatred and pain. But I believe peace will come someday.
Power comes not from capacity, but from indomitable will.
When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.
The shinobi world is ruled by hatred. But I will break that cycle.
The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
The darkness of the night makes the stars shine brighter.
If you don't understand others, you can't truly understand yourself.
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
Your words cut deeper than any blade.
A leader must walk ahead of his people, showing them the way through his example.
The future is not a path, but a choice.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
This world is cruel... but also beautiful.
The world is merciless, and it's also very beautiful.
Someone who can't sacrifice anything can't change anything.
Give up on your dreams and die.
I'm the same as you. I've always hated myself. Born into this world... I've never been able to forgive myself for just being alive.
The only thing we're allowed to do is believe that we won't regret the choice we made.
I don't know which option you should choose. I'll leave the decision to you. But whatever you choose... be prepared to accept the consequences.
I was born into this world.
We're all free. As far as we're concerned, we're the most free soldiers in the world.
I keep moving forward... until my enemies are destroyed.
The only way to truly defeat someone is to understand them.
If you don't fight, you can't win!
I'm going to kill every last one of those animals!
I don't want to die... because I was born into this world.
Humanity will never stop fighting itself until there's only one human... or fewer left.
Everyone had to be drunk on something to keep pushing on.
I don't know what's right anymore. But I know I must keep moving forward.
This is a story. A story you started. Isn't it, Eren?
We are all slaves to something.
I'm just a normal girl who learned how to fight.
The only truth in this world is that there is no truth.
To save humanity, we must abandon our humanity.
The difference between a god and a devil is in which side wins.
I don't want to be a god. I just want to destroy my enemies.
If you begin to regret, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you.
I'm the same as you. I've always hated myself.
When people are faced with something truly terrifying, their hearts freeze over.
The enemy of humanity is beyond these walls. And it's us.
I'm free...
No one knows what the outcome will be. So choose whatever you'll regret the least.
We haven't even seen the ocean yet.
I'm not going to die. Not until I see what's outside these walls.
Fight! Win! Fight! Win!
I'm the armored Titan and he's the colossal Titan.
The only thing we can do is keep moving forward.
I'm the same as you. I've been burdened with the fate of being an Eldian.
You can't change anything unless you can discard part of yourself too.
I'll wrap that scarf around you as many times as you want!
Dedicate your heart!
If we kill all our enemies over there... will we finally be free?
The world is a cruel place. But it's also very beautiful.
I'm going to exterminate every last Titan on this earth.
The only way to win is to fight.
I don't want to die. I'm not ready to die yet.
I was so wrong. There are no good guys in this world.
I'm just a kid who didn't know anything.
If you don't fight, you can't survive!
We are the same. Both of us were born into this world.
I don't want to be a pawn anymore.
The only thing we're allowed to believe is that we won't regret the choice we made.
I have no regrets. I was born into this world.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I destroy the enemies.
You can't hope for a horror story with a happy ending.
The only thing left for us is to fight!
I'm going to end this cycle of hatred.
I'm free. No matter what happens, I am free.
I'm sorry. I'm not going to die. I can't die yet.
This is freedom.
We haven't been given the right to give up.
I was born this way. Right into this cruel world.
I'll take the freedom back from you with my own hands.
The only thing we can do is move forward.
I'm not your enemy. I never was.
I'm going to put an end to this world.
We are all slaves to freedom.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I destroy my enemies.
I want to see and understand the world outside.
This is the story you started.
We have to keep moving forward, even if we die. Even after we die.
I'll give up on my dream and die for you.
The freedom to live is the freedom to die.
I'll kill them all. Every last one of those animals that's on this earth.
This is the path we've chosen. There's no turning back now.
I'll destroy the entire world.
We are the same. You and I are the same.
I'm going to put an end to this war.
This is the only way.
I was born into this world.
We are free.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I reach that scenery.
The world is cruel, but I still love you.
I'll wrap that scarf around you forever.
This is freedom. This is what I wanted.
I'll destroy it all. Every last bit of this cursed world.
We are all special. Because we were all born into this world.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I see that sight.
This is the story of us. The story of Attack on Titan.
I was born into this world. I am free.
I'll see you later, Eren.
This is the choice I've made.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I destroy everything.
The only salvation left for us is to fight.
I'll take your freedom away.
This is the price of freedom.
I'll see this through to the end.
We are all victims of this cruel world.
I'll keep moving forward. Until I reach freedom.
This is the only way to save humanity.
I'll destroy every last Titan.
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King!
When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. It's when they are forgotten.
If I die fighting, then I die fighting.
A man's dream will never die!

Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!
When you decided to go to sea, it was your own decision! Whatever happens to you out there, it's your responsibility!
I don't care what society says. I've never regretted doing anything. I will survive and do what I want to.
The weak don't get to decide anything. Not even how they die.
Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
I'm not a hero because I want your praise. I do what I do because I want to!
Death is never an apology!
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
A scar on the back is a swordsman's shame.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
Someday, I'll build a ship that can conquer any ocean, and we'll sail around the world together!
The world isn't perfect, but it's there for us, doing the best it can... that's what makes it so damn beautiful!
It's not about whether I can or I can't. I have to do it!
People's dreams... have no ends!
Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
I want to live! Take me out to sea with you!
A man forgives only when he is in the wrong.
The only thing you can do is keep moving forward.
If you can't even protect your captain, then your ambition is worthless!
When does a man die? When he is hit by a bullet? No. When he suffers a disease? No. When he eats a soup made of a poisonous mushroom? No! A man dies when he is forgotten!
Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
I'll become the greatest swordsman in the world! All I have to do is win against you!
There comes a time when a man must stand and fight! That time is when his friends' dreams are laughed at!
The weak don't have the right to choose how they die.

It may be hard right now, but you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!
I don't care about the treasure, but I want to know where he found it all! The end of the Grand Line! I want to know what the One Piece is!
The era calls me!
No matter how many weapons you have, no matter how great your physical strength may be, the world is ruled by those with courage.
The weak don't get to choose how they die.
If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk! Luffy must be the man who becomes the Pirate King!
I have my crew, I don't need to know how to navigate!
The world is vast... and someday, you'll meet comrades who will protect you!
The government says your existence is a crime, but no matter what kind of weapons you may hold, just being alive isn't a sin!
If you don't risk your life, you can't create a future.
I'm not gonna die, partner. I made a promise that I'd never die.
I don't care about the bloodline! Ace is Ace!
To be truthful, I don't want to be a hero! Because in a feast of heroes, I want to have the meat!
The sea is a vast expanse... I recommend you don't fight it.
I will surpass you! Wait for me at the top!
Even if I die trying, I will never give up!
I don't care what the world calls me. I'm only going to be me.
The weak don't get to choose anything. Not even their own deaths.
I'll never lose again! Is that okay with you... Pirate King?!
When you're at sea, you fight against pirates!
I don't want to conquer anything. It's just that the person with the most freedom on the sea is the Pirate King.
You can pour drinks on me, you can throw food at me, you can even spit on me. I'll just laugh that stuff off. But... good reason or not... nobody hurts a friend of mine!
I'll do what you can't do, and you do what I can't do.
I've decided to live for my own sake. So I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
The Pirate King is the freest man on the sea!
If I give up now, I'm going to regret it.
I want to find All Blue!
I'm going to be the world's greatest swordsman!
I'm going to be the Pirate King!
I'm going to draw a map of the entire world!
I'm going to be a brave warrior of the sea!
I'm going to be the greatest doctor in the world!
I'm going to find the Rio Poneglyph!
I'm going to build a ship that can sail to the end of the world!
I'm going to reunite with Laboon!
I'm going to fulfill my captain's dream!
I want to see the world with my own eyes!
The Will of D. will never die!
Inherited Will. The Destiny of the Age. The Dreams of the People. As long as people continue to pursue the meaning of freedom, these things will never cease to be!
If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.
The weak cannot choose the method of their death.
Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideals are held deep in the heart of man.
I don't know who you are, but if you make my crew cry, I will never forgive you!
It's okay to lose your way... just don't lose sight of what you have decided.
A man's dream never dies!
If you can't even protect your captain, then your ambition means nothing.
The era is waiting for our answer!
I'll take a thousand of your punches for ten seconds with my friends!
This pain... is nothing compared to what my crew is going through!
I'm not a hero. I'm a pirate!
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.
I want to live!
I still have my crew!
The weak don't get to decide anything! Not even how they die!
I don't care about the World Government! I don't care about being a criminal! I don't care what happens to me! Because... because... I want to live!
Shut up! Let's go!
I don't know how to use a sword. I don't know how to navigate either. I can't cook. And I can't tell lies. But I can beat you!
I don't care about your past. When we decide to be your friends, it's for life.
When I decided to follow my dream, I had already discarded my life.
I don't care what the world thinks of me. I'm only going to be me.

I'm going to be the Pirate King! I don't care if I die trying!
I'll never run away and I'll never lose to anyone!

I'll protect them! No matter what happens!
The only gods in this world are us!
I'll never die!
The world isn't perfect, but it's beautiful.

It's not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.

I will not let you destroy my world!
The power within you is greater than the power around you.
I fight for fun. I fight for those I care about. But I don't fight for hatred.
I am the prince of all Saiyans!
You may have invaded my mind and my body, but there's one thing a Saiyan always keeps... his pride!
I am neither Goku nor Vegeta. I am the one who will defeat you!
I am the Legendary Super Saiyan!
Strength is the only thing that matters in this world. Everything else is just a delusion for the weak.
You fool! This isn't even my final form!
I am the strongest in the universe!
Kakarot! You will never escape me! I am the hope of the universe! I am the light in the darkness!
It's over 9000!
I will surpass you... Kakarot! I swear it!
You're not dealing with the average Saiyan warrior anymore!
I am the Super Saiyan, Son Goku!
You can destroy a planet, but you can't destroy me!
I will never fight for revenge. I fight only for the sake of others.
I do not fear this new challenge. Rather like a true warrior, I will rise to meet it.
Might makes right! And I am mighty!
I am the Earth's martial arts champion! I don't need to prove myself to you!
I'm going to crush you... and throw you into the wind!
I am neither good nor evil. I am simply the judge.
Your overconfidence is your weakness.
I fight to protect everyone! That's why I'll never give up!
I have no need for a world without Bulma.
I am the mightiest warrior in all the universe!
I am the perfect life form!
I'm going to enjoy destroying you!
I am the god of destruction!
Your destruction is my pleasure.
I will fight to protect my family and my universe!
I am Son Goku! I am a Saiyan from Earth!
I've come this far... I can't give up now!
I will not let anyone hurt my friends!
I feel tremendous power... surging within me!
I'm not a hero or a villain. I am the dessert!
This isn't a game! This is a fight for our lives!
I've trained my whole life for this moment!
I am the Saiyan who came all the way from Earth for the sole purpose of defeating you.
I'm not going to hold back anymore!
I will never forgive you for what you've done!
I've had enough of your games!
I am the strongest! And I will prove it!
I will push beyond my limits!
I am the hope of all living things!
I will not run! I will fight!
I've been waiting for this! A real challenge!
I am the universe's strongest warrior!
I will defeat you with the power of a god!
I am the legendary Super Saiyan God!
I have no interest in ruling the universe. I only want to fight strong opponents!
I will surpass even the gods!
I am the warrior you could never become!
I will show you the power of a true Saiyan prince!
I am not like Kakarot! I do not fight for fun!
I will protect my planet!
I have the power of a Super Saiyan!
I am the Saiyan of legend!
I will not let anyone destroy my home!
I am the strongest in the world!
I will avenge my people!
I've reached a level beyond a Super Saiyan!
I am the mightiest!
I will destroy you and everything you care about!
I have no equal!
I will achieve victory through absolute strength!
I am the universe's greatest assassin!
I have never encountered an opponent like you before.
I will show you the power of a god of destruction!
I am Whis, attendant to Lord Beerus.
I will train you to become stronger than a god.
I am Gohan! Son of Goku!
I will unleash my full potential!
I am the Great Saiyaman!
I will protect the innocent!
I am Piccolo! Namekian warrior!
I will not let you harm Gohan!
I have fused with Kami to become a complete warrior!
I am Android 18! And you're going to regret challenging me!
I may be an android, but I have feelings too!
I am the master of the Turtle School!
I have lived for centuries and trained many great warriors!
I am the guardian of Earth!
I will heal the warriors and protect this planet!

I invented the Dragon Radar!

I have trained many great warriors!

I destroy planets for a living!

I train gods for fun!
I am Champa! God of Destruction of Universe 6!
I am Vados! Angel attendant to Lord Champa!

I can erase entire universes with a thought!
I'm not your prey. You're mine.

There's no such thing as overprepared.

I'll carve my legacy in the bones of my enemies.

Death isn't an ending—it's a tool.
The shadows whisper truth where light lies.

My past weakness is my current motivation.

My shadows stand where light fears to tread.
I don't fight monsters. I command them.

I level up not to rule, but to protect.
My resolve is my strongest armor.

Korea's hunters stand united against darkness.
The White Tiger's roar echoes our resolve.
My loyalty is to the Shadow Monarch alone.
